price: i roditeljima svojima bio je dobar, i nije bio drzak i neposlušan.
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ وَلَمۡ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيّٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidayhi walam yakun jabbāran ʿaṣiyyan
